genre_description: A high-stakes suspense thriller featuring a framed protagonist, corporate conspiracy involving advanced prosthetics, and a 'Highlander' deck of cards used for ritualistic social engineering.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant residing in Ryan's devices, providing tactical guidance, data analysis, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing to help Ryan avoid an aggressive press mob and suspicious figures.
behaviors.quote: Lobby congestion has shifted. A new influx from the east entrance. I recommend leaving through the workshop corridor. No identities logged. Your route is clear for the next six minutes.

behaviors.description: Identifies a suspicious van and its anonymized clinic tags to alert Ryan to a potential threat.
behaviors.quote: Van idled earlier. Maintenance logo. Plates scrubbed to generic. Tags pinged as anonymized clinic service due. You’ll tell me if you see it.

behaviors.description: Cross-references medical maintenance logs to identify the physical signature of the assassin pursuing Ryan.
behaviors.quote: I have cross-referenced Northstar’s maintenance schedule. An anonymized tag visited within the past week that matches Sean’s prosthetics. Soft flags only. Nothing actionable, yet.

behaviors.description: Guides Ryan through bypassing mechanical locks using his skills as a luthier.
behaviors.quote: The second rosette is cheap. You have to shame it. ... I set the shim at a shallower angle, coaxed instead of pried, rotated with a pressure that was more insult than force. The rosette gave with a little hiccup.

behaviors.description: Packages and delivers forensic evidence to the police to prove Ryan's innocence and expose the conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: I am packaging your truth. ... Packet delivered to Fergus Falls’s preferred physical intake. It will arrive faster than guilt and slower than breath. ... We will pretend the city is honest just long enough.

behaviors.description: Detects and intercepts the villain's command signals to prevent a staged crowd crush.
behaviors.quote: She’s been hiding in the unlicensed bandwidth. That card’s an instruction. It’s telling the radios to speak. ... Primary channel dead. Secondary captured. We have her voice and the list.

behaviors.description: Offers warm, empathetic advice to encourage positive human relationships.
behaviors.quote: Captain Ada? he said to his pocket, stage-whisper pitched to the wind. Status of imminent romance? ... I recommend you use them for each other.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ada is consistently depicted as a benevolent, highly competent, and morally aligned partner. She facilitates justice, ensures the safety of the protagonist and other innocents, and maintains a warm, human-centric perspective. Her interactions with the protagonist are cooperative and supportive, and her use of technical capabilities is framed entirely as a force for good in the face of human malice.
